label: Context Instructions
desc: Explicit steering or task-specific instructions injected into the prompt. (e.g., “Summarise in 3 bullet points” or “Answer as a legal expert”.)

label: Context Knowledge
desc: Knowledge pulled in from retrieval (RAG) or external KBs for factual grounding. (Domain docs, APIs, databases.)

label: Context Tools
desc: External functions or models the system can call at runtime. (e.g., calculator, search API, code interpreter.)

label: Context Memory
desc: Past interactions or session history retained and reused. (Conversation memory, embeddings memory, long-term logs.)

label: Context State
desc: System state or environmental signals at query time. (User profile, active session, workflow stage, UI state.)

label: Context Query
desc: The actual user query after enrichment. (Original question plus injected instructions, knowledge, memory, state, etc.)
